title: Amethyst Cluster
description: Metaphysical crystal practitioners may also believe that amethyst geodes or crystals placed in your home will absorb negative energy and create an air of tranquility in the space.

title: Grey Amethyst Cluster
description: The spiritual meaning of Amethyst is groundedness, tranquility, and calm.

title: Brazilian Amethyst Geode
description: Brazilian Amethyst also provides a wonderful peaceful energy for meditations, and helps with developing intuition and psychic abilities.

title: Smoky Quartz Mushroom Carving
description: Smoky quartz is known to assist with improving overall wellbeing, the release of unwanted emotional baggage, surrendering old wounds, stability and grounding.

title: Ocean Jasper Mushroom Carving
description: Jasper provides protection and absorbs negative energy. It balances yin and yang.

title: Dalmation Jasper Mushroom Carving
description: Dalmatian Jasper is believed to reconnect us with our playful nature.

title: Flower Agate Sphere
description: Strongly connected to the Heart chakra, Flower Agate is often used to promote spontaneity and joy.

title: Purple Mica Sphere
description: Mica is well known as a very gentle stone best for stabilizing mood.

title: Amaonite Sphere
description: Amazonite is used to treat fatigue, trauma or anything else that may take energy away from a person.

title: Chrysocolla Malachite Turquoise and Some with Azurite Veins Tower
description: Chrysocolla has the ability to bring harmony, increase wisdom and guide you toward discretion.

title: Chevron Amethyst Tower
description: This stone is often said to be stronger and more powerful, especially with higher chakras, focusing often on the third eye and crown chakras.

title: Tianshan Blue Quartz Tower
description: Tianshan blue alleviates fear and enhances creativity and expression. It has the effect of balancing the throat chakra.
